title: Flexible Stellarator Physics Facility
authors:
F.I. Parra, S.-G. Baek, M. Churchill, D.R. Demers, B. Dudson, N.M.
  Ferraro, B. Geiger, S. Gerhardt, K.C. Hammond, S. Hudson, R. Jorge, E.
  Kolemen, D.M. Kriete, S.T.A. Kumar, M. Landreman, C. Lowe, D.A. Maurer, F.
  Nespoli, N. Pablant, M.J. Pueschel, A. Punjabi, J.A. Schwartz, C.P.S. Swanson
  and A.M. Wright
abstract:
We propose to build a Flexible Stellarator Physics Facility to explore
promising regions of the vast parameter space of disruption-free stellarator
solutions for Fusion Pilot Plants (FPPs).
